\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em \mbox{[}library's internal use\mbox{]} File to where output messages should be directed. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
Handle the message output file. This module implements the message output file $<$poski\-\_\-logfile$>$ support routines based on the environment variable P\-O\-S\-K\-I\-\_\-\-L\-O\-G\-\_\-\-F\-I\-L\-E.

This module sets $<$poski\-\_\-logfile$>$ to \char`\"{}poski\-\_\-log.\-txt\char`\"{} if P\-O\-S\-K\-I\-\_\-\-L\-O\-G\-\_\-\-F\-I\-L\-E==1, or to stderr otherwise.

N\-O\-T\-E\-: If the library is build with pthread support, these routines are thread-\/safe using pthread mutex.

\begin{DoxyAttention}{Attention}
These routines are usually for the library's internal use and should not normally be called directly by users. 

Called by \hyperlink{poski__InitCloseHandler_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Init\-Close\-Handler.\-c}
\end{DoxyAttention}
Also, refer \hyperlink{poski__MessageHandler_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Message\-Handler.\-c}
